scripts.deploy:test: claudia create --name formio-services-test --handler lambda.handler --config claudia-test.json --deploy-proxy-api --region us-west-2
scripts.update:test: VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]' | sed 's/[\.]/-/g');claudia update --config claudia-test.json --version "v${VERSION}"
scripts.update:prod: VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]' | sed 's/[\.]/-/g');claudia update --version "v${VERSION}"
